  • Uses of WorkExperience in org.cvs.application.api

    Methods in org.cvs.application.api that return WorkExperience 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    WorkExperience WorkExperienceController.addNewApplicationWorkExperience​(WorkExperience workExperience)
    Adds a new work experience entry to an existing candidate via POST through URL: /qualifications.
    WorkExperience WorkExperienceController.getWorkExperience​(java.lang.Long workExperienceId)
    Fetches an active work experience entry via GET through URL: /experiences/active/{workExperienceId}.
    Methods in org.cvs.application.api that return types with arguments of type WorkExperience 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Iterable<WorkExperience> WorkExperienceController.getAllWorkExperiences()
    Fetches all active work experience entries via GET through URL: /experiences.
    java.lang.Iterable<WorkExperience> WorkExperienceController.getWorkExperiences​(java.lang.Long candidateId)
    Fetches active work experience entries for a particular candidate via GET through URL: /experiences/candidate/{candidateId}.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
